selected_skills.name: identify_spatial_relationships
selected_skills.purpose: To determine the geometric relationships between points A, B, C, D, and E on the circle and the extended line.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image data to identify spatial relationships between the points and lines in the diagram.

selected_skills.name: apply_circle_theorems
selected_skills.purpose: To apply circle theorems to calculate the unknown angle ∠CDE using the known angle ∠ABC.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the known angle and circle properties to calculate the unknown angle.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated angle to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated angle and the provided options to select the correct answer.
